scripts.build: concurrently -p "[{name}]" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold" -n backend,dwa "yarn build:backend" "yarn build:dwa" && cp -r dwa/dist/ backend/build/public
scripts.postinstall: concurrently -p "[{name}]" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold" -n backend,dwa "cd backend && yarn install" "cd dwa && yarn install"
